headline: Halliburton (HAL): Exploring Valuation After Institutional Trim Cites U.S. Onshore Challenges and Sector Weakness
summary: Halliburton (HAL) stock is drawing fresh attention after Aristotle Atlantic Core Equity Strategy trimmed its holdings, citing ongoing headwinds in the company’s U.S. onshore business and softness in sector demand. See our latest analysis for Halliburton. Halliburton’s share price has clawed back some ground lately, rising nearly 17% over the past month and 24% in the last 90 days. However, these gains follow a difficult period that left its one-year total shareholder return down 13%. The...
